text: Designed by Jens FagerÂ for Danish brand Muuto, theÂ Tip Lamp is a unique andÂ beautifully minimalÂ table lamp. Created from the idea of stripping a design down to its essentials, the Tip Lamp is an example of simple, functional design with careful attention to detail. Offering direct as well as ambient light, the lamp's adjustable head and arm feature an opal diffuser and dimmer function that effortlessly alters the volume of light. Display on your desk, shelf or sideboard.
label: OTHER

text: Also available as a Wall Lamp and Floor Lamp.
label: OTHER

text: Materials & Bulb: view product fact sheet
label: OTHER

text: WE OFFER FREE UK DELIVERY ON ALL ORDERS OVER Â£50
label: OTHER

text: We process orders Monday - Friday between 9.30am and 5pm. Â Please contact us with any order enquiries during these hours at hello@somedaydesigns.co.uk or give us a call on 020 8305 7265.
label: OTHER

text: For items we carry in stock, you should receive your order within 3-5 working days, depending on where you are based in the UK.
label: OTHER

text: Due to the bespoke nature and wide choice of our lighting and furniture items, most are not held in stock. We will specifically order these in for you as per the finish, size or colour you have selectedÂ at the point of order. Â Delivery times vary by product and design partner, so please find the relevantÂ lead time information on the product page. Once orders have been received into our warehouse we will arrange final delivery with you.
label: OTHER

text: We offer a simple and competitive delivery rate:
label: OTHER

text: Orders up to the value of Â£50
label: OTHER

text: Please note, Highlands and Islands deliveries are not included in the UK charges above and may be charged an additional fee so please check prices with us prior to ordering.
label: OTHER

text: There are rare occasions where factors out of our control can delay a delivery, so we ask for your patience in these circumstances and we promise to keep you up to date should this apply to your order.
label: OTHER

text: We can deliver overseas and will need to offer a quotation. Please contact us for a quote, with the details of your order and its destination hello@somedaydesigns.co.uk | 020 8305 7265.
label: OTHER

text: We use Royal Mail, UPS or APC to deliver accessories, small furniture & lighting. Delivery is Monday to Friday, we will notify you once the item has been sent and provide tracking details where applicable.
label: OTHER

text: For large furniture orders such as sofas, we use a specialist furniture home delivery team, who are experts in handling furniture to make sure your delivery goes as smoothly as possible. This service is a 'white glove' service and includes the following:
label: OTHER

text: Confirmation of your two-hour delivery windowÂ the working day before your agreed delivery date
label: OTHER

text: An estimated time of arrival on the day of delivery (this is a guide not a guarantee due to traffic and possible difficulties in earlier deliveries which are out of our control)
label: OTHER

text: Unpack and position the furniture in the room of your choice
label: OTHER

text: We ask that you check the dimensions at the delivery address for access (including doors, corridors and stairs) as well as the area of intended use, before you order to ensure that the product is the right size for you and to enable us to deliver your order successfully. Â You must provide a clear route to the room of choice removing any obstacles from the exterior and communal areas. Â Goods that fail to fit into your property at the point of delivery are your responsibility as we have no control over this. Â Please also advise us of any parking restrictions, red routes or width restrictions ahead of the delivery.
label: OTHER

text: If you are looking to buy a sofa but concerned that it might notÂ fit through your doorway or stairwell then it's worth considering using our access check service. Â For an additional fee a trained member of our team will visit your home toÂ measure up, giving you piece of mind before you buy. Â Get in touch to find out pricing and further details.
label: OTHER

text: As part of the white glove service we can also remove your old furniture for an extra fee, which must be arranged with us prior to delivery. Â We reserve the right to refuse collection of unhygienic furniture for health and safety reasons. Â Please get in touch to find out further details.
label: OTHER

text: We offer a no quibble returns policy* - so you are fully entitled to a refund withinÂ 14 working days of delivery.
label: OTHER

text: *except for the products described below referred to as made-to-order
label: OTHER

text: Please get in touch with us if you wish to return an item and we will advise how best to proceed hello@somedaydesigns.co.uk | 020 8305 7265.
label: OTHER

text: We ask that the product you return isÂ in new, unused, condition with all the original packaging and product tags still attached. Â For small accessory items being returned by post or courier, we advise you use an insured, signed for service in case the parcel fails to reach us. Â Unfortunately we cannot cover the cost of return postage, unless the item is faulty.
label: OTHER

text: Someday DesignsÂ reserve the right to refuse a refund on anyÂ item if we find that the product has not been returned to us in fully resalable condition.
label: OTHER

text: All accurately returned products will be credited to the original purchaserÂ’s credit or debit card, excluding delivery costs, within 7 working days once received and checked. We will email you confirmation once the refund has been made.
label: OTHER

text: We make every effort to deliver your items to you in perfect condition. We recommend that you check your delivery as soon as it is received. If there is a problem with your order please contact hello@somedaydesigns.co.uk |Â 020 8305 7265Â as soon as possible so that we can resolve it for you promptly. WeÂ may ask you to send images of the fault and it is advisable to keep the original packaging in which the item arrived.

text: Returns Procedure for Furniture Orders Only
label: OTHER

text: Should you wish to return a furniture item we will arrange to collect this item from you and will apply an appropriate collection charge, which will be deducted from the refund value when processed. To arrange a collection please contact our team hello@somedaydesigns.co.uk |Â 020 8305 7265.

label: OTHER

text: Self assembly furniture cannot be returned once assembly is part or fully completed

text: Due to the bespoke nature of the products we supply and the diverse choice of finishes and materials, goods are often made-to-order by our design partners and imported from overseas. Â Therefore it is not possible to return these items.

text: This item is part of our Considered CollectionElegantly sculptural, the Molloy collection of dining tables, chairs, shelving and coffee tables feature fluid detailing inspired by a rare act of nature.The idea for the artfully rounded joinery, where two elements meet and seamlessly become one, comes from the unusual meeting of two rivers to form the Molloy River in Western Australia Â– a place where Adam Goodrum hand-built a holiday home with his family. The Molloy collection is available in a variety of timber finishes.Winner of the Good Design Awards 2016.

text: A firm believer that every environment is defined by the objects within it, Adam Goodrum designs with the philosophy that an object must therefore justify its existence Â– through its story and detailing. For this reason, his designs celebrate process and craftsmanship, and accentuate components and joinery to create functional pieces with spirit and personality. In recent years, GoodrumÂ’s work has been awarded a host of design accolades including the NGV Rigg Prize, Vogue x Alessi Design Prize, Indesign Luminary Award and the Idea Awards EditorÂ’s Medal. He has also been commissioned to design pieces for several global luxury brands including Veuve Clicquot, Alessi and Cappellini.

text: We process orders Monday - Friday between 9.30am and 5pm. Â Please contact us with any order enquiries during these hours at hello@somedaydesigns.co.uk or give us a call on 020 8305 7265.
label: OTHER

text: For items we carry in stock, you should receive your order within 3-5 working days, depending on where you are based in the UK.
label: OTHER

text: Due to the bespoke nature and wide choice of our lighting and furniture items, most are not held in stock. We will specifically order these in for you as per the finish, size or colour you have selectedÂ at the point of order. Â Delivery times vary by product and design partner, so please find the relevantÂ lead time information on the product page. Once orders have been received into our warehouse we will arrange final delivery with you.
label: OTHER

text: We offer a simple and competitive delivery rate:
label: OTHER

text: Orders up to the value of Â£50
label: OTHER

text: Please note, Highlands and Islands deliveries are not included in the UK charges above and may be charged an additional fee so please check prices with us prior to ordering.
label: OTHER

text: There are rare occasions where factors out of our control can delay a delivery, so we ask for your patience in these circumstances and we promise to keep you up to date should this apply to your order.
label: OTHER

text: We can deliver overseas and will need to offer a quotation. Please contact us for a quote, with the details of your order and its destination hello@somedaydesigns.co.uk | 020 8305 7265.
label: OTHER

text: We use Royal Mail, UPS or APC to deliver accessories, small furniture & lighting. Delivery is Monday to Friday, we will notify you once the item has been sent and provide tracking details where applicable.
label: OTHER

text: For large furniture orders such as sofas, we use a specialist furniture home delivery team, who are experts in handling furniture to make sure your delivery goes as smoothly as possible. This service is a 'white glove' service and includes the following:
label: OTHER

text: Confirmation of your two-hour delivery windowÂ the working day before your agreed delivery date
label: OTHER

text: An estimated time of arrival on the day of delivery (this is a guide not a guarantee due to traffic and possible difficulties in earlier deliveries which are out of our control)
label: OTHER

text: Unpack and position the furniture in the room of your choice
label: OTHER

text: We ask that you check the dimensions at the delivery address for access (including doors, corridors and stairs) as well as the area of intended use, before you order to ensure that the product is the right size for you and to enable us to deliver your order successfully. Â You must provide a clear route to the room of choice removing any obstacles from the exterior and communal areas. Â Goods that fail to fit into your property at the point of delivery are your responsibility as we have no control over this. Â Please also advise us of any parking restrictions, red routes or width restrictions ahead of the delivery.
label: OTHER

text: If you are looking to buy a sofa but concerned that it might notÂ fit through your doorway or stairwell then it's worth considering using our access check service. Â For an additional fee a trained member of our team will visit your home toÂ measure up, giving you piece of mind before you buy. Â Get in touch to find out pricing and further details.
label: OTHER

text: As part of the white glove service we can also remove your old furniture for an extra fee, which must be arranged with us prior to delivery. Â We reserve the right to refuse collection of unhygienic furniture for health and safety reasons. Â Please get in touch to find out further details.
label: OTHER

text: We offer a no quibble returns policy* - so you are fully entitled to a refund withinÂ 14 working days of delivery.
label: OTHER

text: *except for the products described below referred to as made-to-order
label: OTHER

text: Please get in touch with us if you wish to return an item and we will advise how best to proceed hello@somedaydesigns.co.uk | 020 8305 7265.
label: OTHER

text: We ask that the product you return isÂ in new, unused, condition with all the original packaging and product tags still attached. Â For small accessory items being returned by post or courier, we advise you use an insured, signed for service in case the parcel fails to reach us. Â Unfortunately we cannot cover the cost of return postage, unless the item is faulty.
label: OTHER

text: Someday DesignsÂ reserve the right to refuse a refund on anyÂ item if we find that the product has not been returned to us in fully resalable condition.
label: OTHER

text: All accurately returned products will be credited to the original purchaserÂ’s credit or debit card, excluding delivery costs, within 7 working days once received and checked. We will email you confirmation once the refund has been made.
label: OTHER

text: We make every effort to deliver your items to you in perfect condition. We recommend that you check your delivery as soon as it is received. If there is a problem with your order please contact hello@somedaydesigns.co.uk |Â 020 8305 7265Â as soon as possible so that we can resolve it for you promptly. WeÂ may ask you to send images of the fault and it is advisable to keep the original packaging in which the item arrived.
label: OTHER

text: Returns Procedure for Furniture Orders Only
label: OTHER

text: Should you wish to return a furniture item we will arrange to collect this item from you and will apply an appropriate collection charge, which will be deducted from the refund value when processed. To arrange a collection please contact our team hello@somedaydesigns.co.uk |Â 020 8305 7265.
label: OTHER

text: Products, which fall into the following categories, will not be refunded unless they are proven to be faulty;
label: OTHER

text: Any goods made to order or not normally kept in stock atÂ Someday Designs (see more information below)
label: OTHER

text: Self assembly furniture cannot be returned once assembly is part or fully completed
label: OTHER

text: Due to the bespoke nature of the products we supply and the diverse choice of finishes and materials, goods are often made-to-order by our design partners and imported from overseas. Â Therefore it is not possible to return these items.
label: OTHER

text: We will contact you via email to confirm your made-to-order details to ensure all specifications are completely correct before we place the order with the supplier. Following delivery, made-to-order goods are non-returnable unless we have not supplied the correct item or specification as per the order confirmation email.
label: OTHER

text: Made-to-order piecesÂ are furniture and lighting items whereby you select a fabric, colour, material finish or size at point of order.
label: OTHER

label: OTHER

text: This item is part of our Considered CollectionElegantly sculptural, the Molloy collection of dining tables, chairs, shelving and coffee tables feature fluid detailing inspired by a rare act of nature.The idea for the artfully rounded joinery, where two elements meet and seamlessly become one, comes from the unusual meeting of two rivers to form the Molloy River in Western Australia Â– a place where Adam Goodrum hand-built a holiday home with his family. The Molloy collection is available in a variety of timber finishes.Winner of the Good Design Awards 2016.
label: OTHER

text: Product made from sustainably sourced materials with a lower environmental impact than conventional alternatives.
label: OTHER

text: Download NAU Standards Finishes and Upholstery Overview
label: OTHER

text: Solid timber in oak, walnut, ash or black stained ash.
label: OTHER

text: A firm believer that every environment is defined by the objects within it, Adam Goodrum designs with the philosophy that an object must therefore justify its existence Â– through its story and detailing. For this reason, his designs celebrate process and craftsmanship, and accentuate components and joinery to create functional pieces with spirit and personality. In recent years, GoodrumÂ’s work has been awarded a host of design accolades including the NGV Rigg Prize, Vogue x Alessi Design Prize, Indesign Luminary Award and the Idea Awards EditorÂ’s Medal. He has also been commissioned to design pieces for several global luxury brands including Veuve Clicquot, Alessi and Cappellini.
label: OTHER

text: Designed by Jens FagerÂ for Danish brand Muuto, theÂ Tip Lamp is a unique andÂ beautifully minimalÂ table lamp. Created from the idea of stripping a design down to its essentials, the Tip Lamp is an example of simple, functional design with careful attention to detail. Offering direct as well as ambient light, the lamp's adjustable head and arm feature an opal diffuser and dimmer function that effortlessly alters the volume of light. Display on your desk, shelf or sideboard.
label: OTHER

text: Also available as a Wall Lamp and Floor Lamp.
label: OTHER
